verses.verse: חָ֭כְמוֹת <WH2454> Wisdom בָּנְתָ֣ה <WH1129> hath builded בֵיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> her house חָצְבָ֖ה <WH2672> she hath hewn out עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <WH5982> pillars שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> her seven

טָבְחָ֣ה <WH2873> She hath killed טִ֭בְחָהּ <WH2874> her beasts מָסְכָ֣ה <WH4537> she hath mingled יֵינָ֑הּ <WH3196> her wine אַ֝֗ף <WH637> has also עָֽרְכָ֥ה <WH6186> she hath also furnished שֻׁלְחָנָֽהּ׃ <WH7979> her table

שָֽׁלְחָ֣ה <WH7971> She hath sent forth נַעֲרֹתֶ֣יהָ <WH5291> her maidens תִקְרָ֑א <WH7121> she crieth עַל־ <WH5921> From גַּ֝פֵּ֗י <WH1610> upon מְרֹ֣מֵי <WH4791> the highest places קָֽרֶת׃ <WH7176> of the city

מִי־ <WH4310> Whoever פֶ֭תִי <WH6612> Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <WH5493> let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> here חֲסַר־ <WH2638> hither [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <WH3820> understanding אָ֣מְרָה <WH559> she saith לּֽוֹ׃
לְ֭כוּ <WH1980> Come לַחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> eat בְֽלַחֲמִ֑י <WH3899> of my bread וּ֝שְׁת֗וּ <WH8354> and drink בְּיַ֣יִן <WH3196> of the wine מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ <WH4537> [which] I have mingled
עִזְב֣וּ <WH5800> Forsake פְתָאיִ֣ם <WH6612> the foolish וִֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> and live וְ֝אִשְׁר֗וּ <WH833> and go בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> of understanding

יֹ֤סֵ֨ר ׀ <WH3256> He that reproveth לֵ֗ץ <WH3887> a scorner לֹקֵ֣חַֽ <WH3947> getteth ל֣וֹ קָל֑וֹן <WH7036> to himself shame וּמוֹכִ֖יחַ <WH3198> and he that rebuketh לְרָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> a wicked מוּמֽוֹ׃ <WH3971> [man getteth] himself a blot

אַל־ <WH408> not תּ֣וֹכַח <WH3198> Reprove לֵ֭ץ <WH3887> not a scorner פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יִשְׂנָאֶ֑ךָּ <WH8130> lest he hate הוֹכַ֥ח <WH3198> thee rebuke לְ֝חָכָ֗ם <WH2450> a wise man וְיֶאֱהָבֶֽךָּ׃ <WH157> and he will love

תֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Give לְ֭חָכָם <WH2450> [instruction] to a wise וְיֶחְכַּם־ <WH2449> [man] and he will be yet wiser ע֑וֹד <WH5750> will be still הוֹדַ֥ע <WH3045> teach לְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> a just וְי֣וֹסֶף <WH3254> [man] and he will increase לֶֽקַח׃ <WH3948> in learning פ

תְּחִלַּ֣ת <WH8462> [is] the beginning חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> of wisdom יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> The fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> and the knowledge קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> of the holy בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> [is] understanding

כִּי־ <WH3588> for בִ֭י יִרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> shall be multiplied יָמֶ֑יךָ <WH3117> For by me thy days וְיוֹסִ֥יפוּ <WH3254> shall be increased לְּ֝ךָ֗ שְׁנ֣וֹת <WH8141> and the years חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of thy life

אִם־ <WH518> If חָ֭כַמְתָּ <WH2449> If thou be wise חָכַ֣מְתָּ <WH2449> thou shalt be wise לָּ֑ךְ וְ֝לַ֗צְתָּ <WH3887> for thyself but [if] thou scornest לְֽבַדְּךָ֥ <WH905> alone תִשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> thou alone shalt bear
אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> woman כְּ֭סִילוּת <WH3687> A foolish הֹֽמִיָּ֑ה <WH1993> [is] clamorous פְּ֝תַיּ֗וּת <WH6615> [she is] simple וּבַל־ <WH1077> and יָ֥דְעָה <WH3045> knoweth מָּֽה׃ <WH4100> nothing

וְֽ֭יָשְׁבָה <WH3427> For she sitteth לְפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> at the door בֵּיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> of her house עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּ֝סֵּ֗א <WH3678> on a seat מְרֹ֣מֵי <WH4791> in the high places קָֽרֶת׃ <WH7176> of the city
לִקְרֹ֥א <WH7121> To call לְעֹֽבְרֵי־ <WH5674> pass דָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> Who הַֽ֝מְיַשְּׁרִ֗ים <WH3474> who go right אֹֽרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH734> on their ways

מִי־ <WH4310> Whoever פֶ֭תִי <WH6612> Whoso [is] simple יָסֻ֣ר <WH5493> let him turn in הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> here וַחֲסַר־ <WH2638> hither and [as for] him that wanteth לֵ֝֗ב <WH3820> understanding וְאָ֣מְרָה <WH559> she saith לּֽוֹ׃
מַֽיִם־ <WH4325> waters גְּנוּבִ֥ים <WH1589> Stolen יִמְתָּ֑קוּ <WH4985> are sweet וְלֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> and bread סְתָרִ֣ים <WH5643> [eaten] in secret יִנְעָֽם׃ <WH5276> is pleasant

וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָ֭דַע <WH3045> But he knoweth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that רְפָאִ֣ים <WH7496> not that the dead שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> are there בְּעִמְקֵ֖י <WH6012> [are] in the depths שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> of hell קְרֻאֶֽיהָ׃ <WH7121> [are] there [and that] her guests פ
